channel.title: Moving images in space-time
channel.description: Recent content on Moving images in space-time

item.title: The Irishman (2019)
item.description: Frank Sheeran (Robert De Niro), a Mafia hitman, looks back on his life and his mob carrier with emphasis on his relationships with famous American labour leader, Jimmy Hoffa (Al Pacino) and Russell Bufalino, the head of the Northeastern Pennsylvania crime family (Joe Pesci).

item.title: Moj drugi post
item.description: Ovdje je svašta samo nije ono što treba biti. Nadamo se boljem, ali očito nikad nije. Nemoj tu krivo biti.

item.title: About
item.description: A blog dedicated to all movies/series lovers who want to know more about historical and geographical context of the particular movie or series. Idea was to combine somehow my affection towards movies and series with my interests in geography and history. Who could benefit from the blog: quiz players aspiring smartasses seducers
